prompt1.name: Analyse Reading Material
prompt1.content: Analyse this reading material and provide the analysis in JSON format: {'analysis': '<your_analysis_here>'}

prompt2.name: 10 Short Answers
prompt2.content: Create 10 short-answer questions from this reading material. Output each question as a JSON object with the key 'question', like this: [{'question': 'Question 1'}, {'question': 'Question 2'}, ...]

prompt3.name: 10 Multiple Choices
prompt3.content: Create 10 multiple-choice questions from this reading material. Output each question as a JSON object with the keys 'question', 'option1', 'option2', 'option3', 'option4', and 'correctOption', like this: [{'question': 'Question 1', 'option1': 'Option A', 'option2': 'Option B', 'option3': 'Option C', 'option4': 'Option D', 'correctOption': 'Option B'}, ...]

prompt4.name: 10 True/False
prompt4.content: Create 10 true/false questions from this reading material. Output each question as a JSON object with the keys 'question', 'option1', 'option2', and 'correctOption', like this: [{'question': 'Question 1', 'option1': 'True', 'option2': 'False', 'correctOption': 'True'}, ...]

prompt5.name: 10 Agree/Disagree
prompt5.content: Create 10 agree/disagree questions from this reading material. Output each question as a JSON object with the keys 'question', 'option1', 'option2', and 'correctOption', like this: [{'question': 'Question 1', 'option1': 'Agree', 'option2': 'Disagree', 'correctOption': 'Agree'}, ...]

prompt6.name: 10 Correct/Incorrect
prompt6.content: Create 10 correct/incorrect questions from this reading material. Output each question as a JSON object with the keys 'question', 'option1', 'option2', and 'correctOption', like this: [{'question': 'Question 1', 'option1': 'Correct', 'option2': 'Incorrect', 'correctOption': 'Correct'}, ...]

prompt7.name: 10 Highlight
prompt7.content: Create 10 questions from this reading material, each starting with 'Please highlight in the paragraph: ' and output each question as a JSON object with the key 'question', like this: [{'question': 'Please highlight in the paragraph: Question 1'}, ...]
